name: perfice
description: Perfice is a minimal self-hosted time tracking system that allows users to log work hours, generate reports, and visualize time spent across tasks and projects.
features: Time Logging: Track work hours with start/stop timers or manual entry for accurate time recording across tasks and projects.
Project Organization: Group time entries by projects and tasks for structured tracking of different work streams.
Report Generation: Create detailed reports showing time spent by project, task, or date range for billing and analysis.
Visual Analytics: Charts and graphs display time distribution patterns to identify productivity trends and time allocation.
Export Functionality: Download time data in CSV or PDF format for invoicing, payroll, or external reporting systems.
Minimal Interface: Clean, distraction-free UI focuses on quick time entry without unnecessary complexity.
Tag System: Apply tags to time entries for flexible categorization beyond project and task hierarchies.
Calendar View: Visualize logged time on a calendar to see work patterns and identify gaps in time tracking.
Multi-User Support: Track time for multiple team members with individual accounts and consolidated reporting.
Billable Hours: Mark time entries as billable or non-billable for accurate client invoicing and cost tracking.
Time Rounding: Configure automatic rounding rules for time entries to match billing increments and standards.
API Access: Integrate with external tools and automate time tracking workflows through REST API endpoints.
